website_summaries.verdict: Priced low enough to justify ordering in bulk. Various colors and sizes to choose from and suitable for all seasons. Machine washable colors won't bleed. Ideal for users sensitive to allergens.
pros: All the benefits of natural cotton, including breathability and softness
Popular choice for hospital and elder care use
Works well as a throw blanket for casual use
cons: Loose weave pattern affects thermal quality

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off!!
customer_reviews.text: Beware of sizing!! I ordered this for a standard twin bed. The Amazon description says it is 66" x 90". It actually measures about 78" x 103" and the packaging says is labeled "twin/full", not "twin" as the Amazon description reads. I kept it to put on my full size bed. It seems a fine blanket but there's no way it will go on a twin bed. I tried and it draped to the floor on all sides and had to be turned down a full third to expose the pillow on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M.

customer_reviews.title: Upon opening the package, the blanket had an unpleasant ...
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package, the blanket had an unpleasant smell but more disturbing was the two insect bites to my right arm from what appeared to be a spider in the blanket. As I was trying to refold the blanket with the intention to return it, another bug crawled out of the blanket. It is returning to Amazon. I couldn't even get it back into the plastic bag. Sorry - but not satisified.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ann Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket for the price
customer_reviews.text: In original packaging. Nice blanket. No complaints so far. It laundered very nicely. I was hoping it was slate blue as depicted in the picture and it was. So, the only thing not right is the color description of "Navy" blue. This is most definitely not a navy blue; well, at least not my traditional view of navy blue being a dark blue. The blanket is indeed 100% cotton and feels very nice. It's also a nice weight. Not as light as some might like, I'm sure. Very pleased with it though.
customer_reviews.author: D Tally

customer_reviews.title: Way huge
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight blanket for the warmer seasons or naps (at which I am very proficient), but they are HUGE. I ordered and received a TWIN, yet for all intents and purposes it is closer to a full/queen. Good price. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JacksonK

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for something that would work for cool summer nights
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's bed. I was looking for something that would work for cool summer nights, spring, and fall on it's own and then layer with other blankets for winter. My other consideration was that I wanted something that would wash well-since our pets like to sleep with the kiddo her blankets get washed often. She's been using it for about a month and it's been washed twice. It's a nice weight for warmth and has help up beautifully in the wash machine. We have not had any issues with lint with ours(blue)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Armes

customer_reviews.title: Not Soft and Luxurious as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Advertisement included in package says "soft and luxurious". I would not use either of these words to describe the blankets. They are a nice size, but appear to be more like drape material than blanket material. I was hoping for soft "sheet blankets" for comfort in my guest room. Even after i washed and dried them with several dryer sheets, they came out the same. I will probably give these away. Maybe a homeless person can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the color for me
customer_reviews.text: Color was deceiving in the advertisement. I thought the picture looked like it might be grays and blues, but it turned out to be beige, browns and leaning toward khaki green. If you like those colors, go for it, it was just not the color I wanted. I got a different color of this same blanket and love the quality and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Liked that defined texture of 100% cotton
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 3 different colors and like the quality. This is a 100% cotton, with a little texture and stiffness, typical of cotton. If you are looking for a soft blanket, this is not the item for you but if you are like me who likes that defined texture in their blanket, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MegM

customer_reviews.title: Good blanket for anyone staying in a nursing facility.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several of these blankets over time for my mom in the nursing home and for some reason the teal color was not as soft as the 4 others I have ordered over the years. But I was still o.k. with it and would order again if I need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Love

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this thermal Blanket.,however I unfortunately will not buy more because I noticed they are imported from Pakistan.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: How to make a great blanket a so-so blanket.
customer_reviews.text: The size is twin/full which makes it too large for my twin bed. Just like a bed spread I bought that was Full/Queen. It hung to the floor on a full bed. Looked silly so I gave it away. When the Bean Counters get involved in Management the result is sometimes silly. There's fewer SKU's its true, but half of them are not quite right.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Allen

customer_reviews.title: Hospital style blanket
customer_reviews.text: My 93-yr-old mother sits in her favorite chair the majority of every day. Spreading a blanket over the chair keeps everything fresh. I bought 3 so we can change it every week. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BonSue

customer_reviews.title: Check out the details
customer_reviews.text: I do like the type, weight and color of this blanket but I didn't realize this product was an irregular or second quality item. It has a huge area in the middle that appears to have been mended. Fortunately, I purchased it for a rarely used guest room bed which is good since I just recently opened it and it is too late to return. I don't understand why sellers cannot be honest about their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This is the warmest blanket without the bulk! Washes up nicely and retains its shape. I didn’t want fleece anything on the bed and this is 100% cotton and had little to no shrinking! I will buy more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these for three twin beds and I was pleased with both the weight of them (not too heavy, not too light), and the quality. They are similar to lightweight blankets you see in hospitals and such. They look a little wrinkled, but I figured that didn't really matter since they would always be under a coverlet, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieV

customer_reviews.title: A pice of junk
customer_reviews.text: This is not a thermal blanket. It is woven far too tightly to trap air, which is what a thermal blanket does. It is far,far too big to fit a twin size bed. On my bed ot dras on the floor on either side of the bed. It is a foot too long. If I could give it less than one star I would.
customer_reviews.author: old cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Super soft. mid weight. Great for fall\spring on its own because it allows some airflow. Simply add a second blanket and you're set for cold night while still having softness on your skin. Favorite blanket for snuggling in front of TV
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: The blanket is not soft, even after washing and drying it.
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the feel of the blanket. I expected it to be soft like thermal blankets I've purchased in the past. Even after washing and drying the blankets, they were still rough. Was hoping to use them for upcoming visitors but, will not be able to do so. I'm not usually disappointed in my orders but this one is rated a zero in my books.
customer_reviews.author: TYRA BREWER

customer_reviews.title: NOT a twin/full blanket! Not suitable for full beds.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a blanket for a twin bed and for a bed-and-a-half. Since this was advertised as a "twin/full" I purchased the same product in different colors for my two beds. Each blanket is fine for a twin bed. They arrived without a 'smell' or 'loose threads'. The length is consistent and very generous. The blanket would work well on an extra-long twin. But there is no way you will be satisfied with this blanket if you put it on a full-sized bed. It is skimpy on the sides of my bed-and-a-half which is not as wide as a full. It is 4-stars as a twin blanket and 2-stars as a full.
customer_reviews.author: E. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and it's lighweight for summer
customer_reviews.text: Very rough and not soft at all. Thought it would soften after a few washings and it didn't really. Love the color and it's lighweight for summer, but wish it was softer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Order next size up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a queen size and whether it was small to begin with or it shrunk looks more like a full size blanket
customer_reviews.author: DDA

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight thermal blanket. Light if you use alone, warm with another blanket on top. Really pleased
customer_reviews.author: Ann L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blanket...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light wt. blanket. It will be good as a summer blanket or in combination with a couple of others like I am using it now. It is very soft and snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Barb H

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law loves these for her and her husband who is now on separate beds because of illness. They add color.
customer_reviews.author: cuttie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love how well this blanket is made. The quality is excellent! It is lightweight but keeps off the chill. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Twin/Full?  Huh?  And dirty... disappointed all around.
customer_reviews.text: First, the size says "Twin", but when it arrives it is labeled Twin/Full. Huh? Full is 2x Twin. It is way too big to fit on a twin bed. Opened the package anyway to confirm the size, and yes, it is way to big for a twin bed. Second, the product was stained and had all kinds of stuff on it... it looked like cardboard shavings, like the product had been dragged around the warehouse floor. Not happy and will be returning. And for those of you looking, I would say this is a thin blanket, not one that seems like it would keep you warm in anything other than summer weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: 2PO blanket.
customer_reviews.text: thought I was ordering a cotton bedspread.. its fine and I like it.. the color too.. I guess it need to prewash to get out the newness..
customer_reviews.author: happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Quality, tight....no excessive stretching.
customer_reviews.text: Quality. Tight weave. Doesn't stretch or distort a lot like some cheap ones do. It's only barely lighter weight and stretchier than the ones I've handled in medical facilities. Great color. A little more vivid than the pale sage that my monitor shows, but still in the right color family as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Mungo

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Larger and heavier than I expected. Didn’t say twin/full. My fault it’s heavier than expected, I didn’t pay enough attention to the “thermal” part.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B

customer_reviews.title: Great to tie dye!
customer_reviews.text: We purchase this to tie dye! Absorbs the dye well. It is a heavy blanket. Super Warm ! We used a tulip kit , wrapped it in plastic, and let it sit for a week before rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: yp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Florida winter.
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are beautiful, soft and light weight but have enough substance to keep the chill off and feel warm and snuggly at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: I’ll be purchasing more of these!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these blankets. They are soft and comfortable. The blankets also went through the washer and dryer just fine with very little lent.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Like it,  but i thought it is small for a full size bed
customer_reviews.text: I liked this blanket but it seemed a bit small for a full size bed. It barely hung off the side of bed.
customer_reviews.author: She D

customer_reviews.title: Wash it to soften it
customer_reviews.text: Was very stiff and hard at first. After a few washes in washing machine dryer it was soft. Very comfortable now
customer_reviews.author: Special Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Needed light blanket
customer_reviews.text: It is heavier than I thought it would be, not sure if I can find something lighter
customer_reviews.author: momak from San Mateo

customer_reviews.title: This twin/full fits our king bed better than a king size
customer_reviews.text: This twin/full fits our king bed better than a king size! I bought it for a massage table cover, oh well, it's a bed cover now. 😒
customer_reviews.author: Annie L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: comfortable , good texture
customer_reviews.text: I like this as a winter extra weight blanket .
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and soft.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is beautiful. A lovely color and a soft touch, it covers my daughter's trundle. The blanket is holding up well under heavy daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Jess K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to give to CA fire victims. They arrived quickly and were greatly appreciative for them.
customer_reviews.author: rjr96762

customer_reviews.title: Weird blanket
customer_reviews.text: The color is off from the photo. And very interestingly the blanket does the opposite thing it should be doing: it makes me feel cold instead of warm! I thought it's my skin that is weird, but when my laptop overheated at one point, this blanket cooled it down very effectively. It's just weird and it's too late to return it now.
customer_reviews.author: CY

customer_reviews.title: Not Soft
customer_reviews.text: I found the blanket to be heavier than expected and not comfortable. It's not at all soft and welcoming. I haven't decided what to do with it but it won't be on my bed or won't be used as a throw. I have washed it twice and it's just not getting softer.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: don't like fuzzy blankets up around my face...this is just right...lightweight and warm
customer_reviews.author: BLM

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality at all. Smelled so strong of plastic when it arrived had to wash it twice. Came out with snags all over. Price reflects the poor quality of this blanket. This blanket is far from soft. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Asquith

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect blanket to use in the summer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these blankets, cream and gray. They are the perfect blanket to use in the summer. Wash very well, amazing price. The only downside is that they are a little rough, but other than that I definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: CBee2016

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent, few loose threads.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good blanket. It's a lot larger than a twin (That's great imo), will cover a full size bed, I'm only docking a star because there were a couple threads loose when I opened it. It's certainly not a deal breaker though. Also I thought the squares pattern would be grey, but it's actually kinda multicolored. Overall, decent $20 blanket, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but pulls easily
customer_reviews.text: Fair for the price. I like that it is nice and light and the design is quite nice. But the threads pull really easily. I dont expect it to last very long. It would be better as a throw blanket that doesn't get used much or as a blanket between the sheets and comforter for extra warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I'm not so happy with this
customer_reviews.text: this is the second than I purchased, the previous blanket was soft. This new one feels thin and hard. I'm not so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lizette Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Way too thin.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thin. More like a bed cover than a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: This was a fiasco!! I returned the two and got credit for one
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Martinez

customer_reviews.title: warm blanket
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, added under a light quilt it provides just the right amount of weight. Easy to wash and dry, holds its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Love the breathable cotton!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could find this in "throw" size. A little too big to use on the couch while watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W

customer_reviews.title: but I was disappointed when I saw it
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with the blanket, but I was disappointed when I saw it. It looked much better in the picture. I needed a twin blanket so that's what I ordered. When it was delivered the package said twin/full. I used it, but will probably keep looking for another.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: saving money on budget.
customer_reviews.text: The product was nothing like the picture. It's gray and white not blue. Why do you one show one picture and send something else? check your web page .
customer_reviews.author: Frank L. Aldrete

customer_reviews.title: Probably good if it were on top of a sheet
customer_reviews.text: I have washed this blanket 4 times. Still feels like sandpaper.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kinnaman

customer_reviews.title: at best.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as 82" x 95"...... what I received was a 74" x 92" blanket. I have issue with this because I have a specific application with a specific size in mind. There was no product label on the blanket so I have no idea if it is actually "100%" real cotton. A $20 questionable rag, at best.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: They look like hospital blankets
customer_reviews.text: They look like hospital blankets. Ugly. Numerous small flaws. No tags on blankets. They are HUGE!!! I will return them because they drag the floor on a twin beds.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value and the pattern and design are such it can be used as a summer bedspread too. I haven't had to wash it yet so don't know how it will hold up in the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: c!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for a blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is an amazing value at twice the price. It is very comfortable when I'm in the bed and it launders beautifully. I highly recommend this item. My daughter purchased one for their bed after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: jriorda

customer_reviews.title: Too loosely woven
customer_reviews.text: It fit the bed, but was too loosely woven to provide any real warmth. It would be good for cool evenings, but not for me because I sleep with the fan on me as well as AC and sometimes get cold, so need something that will be warm. It would be good to use as a throw while watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda R. Willeford

customer_reviews.title: perfect for Tucson, AZ weather.
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it, the other "lightweight" blanket was just too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: lyn Campbell

customer_reviews.title: We like the blanket
customer_reviews.text: We like the blanket, it's very cozy but it seems MUCH larger than a twin size. I'd rather it be too large than too small when it comes to blankets, we were just very surprised with the size! We just tuck the excess under the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rachele Hazel

customer_reviews.title: It was what it claimed
customer_reviews.text: I love cotton. I knew i would love this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: deanna grandbois

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Size - just what I was looking for. Actually using as a full on a queen bed, no overhang showing under quilt when I make the bed.
customer_reviews.author: mcsct

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise they are fine.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one color and got two slightly different, it doesn't matter in the scheme of things but I think you should watch your color variations for those who it would matter to. Otherwise they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: mamaduke51

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have pets
customer_reviews.text: Dark grey is a nice color. Dog nails don't tear rip or pick this - using as a coverlet to protect furniture. Washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Iko Iko

customer_reviews.title: my son is happy with the quality of the blanket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gray and either received the tan or the color of the gray is mis-represented in the pic. Regardless of the color, my son is happy with the quality of the blanket, so it's not worth the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle5678

customer_reviews.title: Ugly colour, rough, bad smell, heavy and difficult to wash!
customer_reviews.text: Colour was a dirty off-white, which isn't too bad because what was worse was the chemical smell of the blanket! Washed it in the washing machine, but it still did not smell great (at least it didn't smell bad anymore!), and blanket was so heavy it was impossible to dry even after 45 minutes in the dryer with heat. I had to put it out in the sun in the end. One last gripe would be that it's very rough, and not nice to sleep in at all! I regretted buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a donation to a street youth drop-in center
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was a great price and was looking for a reasonably priced blanket for a donation. It was a nice weight and will give a young man/woman some much needed warmth this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: These sets exceeded my expectations. Planning to buy another set. These are my sheets for all future purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Crow

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: They are really full size, but very lightweight and well made. Perfect for our Arizona winters! Wash and dry great.
customer_reviews.author: scotvalkyrie

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and perfect for winter as a bit of extra warmth under your comforter.
customer_reviews.author: SJ DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad.
customer_reviews.text: After you wash it several times, it will get a little softer. Just a little stiff but not too bad!
customer_reviews.author: Hot Zingo

customer_reviews.title: I liked the gold one so much I ordered a blue ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality blanket at a low price. I liked the gold one so much I ordered a blue on.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be good quality and color is right.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift so I don't know how it is wearing. This blanket arrived on time, and is as depicted. If I knew how it was wearing I might be able to give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Biz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. I thought being all cotton it would be softer and lighter in weight. It will do for the summer. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Leslee Launer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect1
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I purchased the same kind of blanket from a popular department store. These were half the price and so similar in warmth, I couldn't tell the difference! Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: HappyAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: but I ordered cream and it more like coffee with a splash of cream
customer_reviews.text: It's OK for weight and comfort, but I ordered cream and it more like coffee with a splash of cream. I returned one of them because the color didn't work in my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Kedjen

customer_reviews.title: Not for dogs sleeping on top of bed.
customer_reviews.text: Weave is too loose. Pet nails catch in the threads
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Color not what was shown advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Item marked raspberry color which is what I ordered. Actual color is much lighter more like coral/pink. I'll keep it as a back up blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will be fine.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a fleece blanket. using it on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie D.

customer_reviews.title: Color not quite right
customer_reviews.text: Color is not even remotely close to the picture. I thought I was getting a darker pink, but what came was a baby pink like you'd see on newborn items. The blanket feels nice and sturdy though, just doesn't match in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: Edison

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are even better than I expected! They are soft and just the right size for my futon and my 3/4 bed. I love that they are snag free too.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Germano

customer_reviews.title: ... quite the material i thought it was but i love this
customer_reviews.text: its not quite the material i thought it was but i love this blanket
customer_reviews.author: Colin C.

customer_reviews.title: good quality and does the job
customer_reviews.text: The pattern runs diagonally on the blanket - this makes it look crooked when you make the bed. Otherwise, good quality and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: ErinP

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's definitely a twin-size. Wish you made a double, It does snag on kitty's claws, but I still love it. How about making a cotton covered patchwork quilt?
customer_reviews.author: Rockabillie

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a full size blanket that isn't too large ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a full size blanket that isn't too large for a double bed. Most are too long on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Kat27

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised that the twin size was oversized. Kept my guest warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: m e-l

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but thinner than I expected for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but thinner than I expected for a thermal blanket. It is definitely a light cream color, not white at all. I will be returning because it won't be warm enough and will not match my white bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great blanet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light weight blanket. Stays put on the sheets, keeps me warm without much weight. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Green

customer_reviews.title: Horrible blanket
customer_reviews.text: This had all the softness of a canvas backpack. It didn't look anything like the photo. It was unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged blanket
customer_reviews.text: Product damaged - blanket stained badly - very, very disappointed in receiving damaged product. Shipping carton was dry and undamaged. Blanket was stained inside of its plastic wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this blanket. It is not soft at all. The fabric is Very course. I didn’t return it because I didn’t want to deal with sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are nice blankets. They look good on my day beds ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice blankets. They look good on my day beds and they wash up nicely. Good summer blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Fredra J. Kodama

customer_reviews.title: Cotton Blanket a hit.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket. It provides warmth but is comfortable and I dont get to hot . My only complaint is that is heavy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket. Cotton warm and washes and dries easily.
customer_reviews.author: diane powell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color doesn't run. But my lint trap is packed after drying.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen Drasen

customer_reviews.title: Cozy & warm.
customer_reviews.text: Love these blankets and was happy to find them on line. I ordered one liked it so much ordered two more! So far!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Burns

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Weird size though. Check the size you need before ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: Boint

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color. Goes into washer and dryer without shrinking ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely color. Goes into washer and dryer without shrinking. Warm!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Risher

customer_reviews.title: I would never again buy from this seller or recommend them to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Description said it was 82 inches wide.... wrong 62 inches wide! I would never again buy from this seller or recommend them to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

product_meta.title: 2PO Twin Size 100% Cotton Thermal Blanket (Cream Color)
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1| Color:CreamThese thermal blankets are made of soft natural cotton. They are made from 100-percent cotton yarns. The blankets are great for all 
seasons use. They are both machine washable and dryable. Just cuddle up in bed, on a chair or couch, in a car or even on the beach.
feature_bullets: The luxury and softness of natural cotton
100% natural cotton fiber provide breathability and comfort
